title: Ghostly cloak

properties.name: description
properties.value: The ghostly cloak is a piece of members only armour. Players can obtain one after speaking to Viggora during the Curse of the Empty Lord miniquest. The cloak, according to Viggora, is supposedly drenched "in the blood of a thousand foes."

Ghostly cloak

Item ID6111

The ghostly cloak is a piece of members only armour. Players can obtain one after speaking to Viggora during the Curse of the Empty Lord miniquest. The cloak, according to Viggora, is supposedly drenched "in the blood of a thousand foes."

There are no requirements to wear (though the requirements and completion of Desert Treasure must be met first) and, when worn with the other pieces, the player appears transparent. After initially obtaining the piece, the player can talk to any of the ghosts to get more pieces. A lost cloak can be purchased from Perdu for 15,000 coins. It can be stored in a magic wardrobe in a player owned house.

[[File:Ghostly cloak detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''ghostly cloak''' is a piece of [[members only]] [[armour]]. Players can obtain one after speaking to [[Viggora]] during the [[Curse of the Empty Lord]] [[miniquest]]. The cloak, according to Viggora, is supposedly drenched "in the blood of a thousand foes."

There are no requirements to wear (though the requirements and completion of Desert Treasure must be met first) and, when worn with the other pieces, the player appears transparent. After initially obtaining the piece, the player can talk to any of the ghosts to get more pieces. A lost cloak can be purchased from [[Perdu]] for 15,000 coins. It can be stored in a [[magic wardrobe]] in a player owned house.
